summary: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.
cast: Nicole Kidman|Daniel Craig|Dakota Blue Richards|Ben Walker|Freddie Highmore|Ian McKellen|Eva Green|Jim Carter|Tom Courtenay|Ian McShane|Sam Elliott|Christopher Lee|Kristin Scott Thomas|Edward de Souza|Kathy Bates|Simon McBurney|Jack Shepherd|Magda Szubanski|Derek Jacobi|Clare Higgins|Charlie Rowe|Steven Loton|Michael Antoniou|Mark Mottram|Paul Antony-Barber|Jason Watkins|Jody Halse|Hattie Morahan|John Bett|John Franklyn-Robbins|Jonathan Laury|Tommy Luther|James Rawlings|Joao de Sousa|Habib Nasib Nader|Theo Fraser Steele|Bill Hurst|Elliot Cowan|Sam Hoare|Thomas Arnold|David Garrick|Brian Nickels|Gary Kane|Alfred Harmsworth|Charles Evanson|Patrick Cleary|Tarek Khalil|Madrios Ohannessian|Sandra Wolfe|Hewson Osbourne|Albert Kenrick|John Cartier|Chris Abbott|Alexander Mercury|David Forman|Jamie Anderson|Caridad Angus|Martin Ballantyne|Tom Barker|Christian Black|Douglas Bunn|Martin Alexander Colton|Jonny Dickens|Clive Elkington|Tim Glanfield|Chris Hastings|Michael Hennessy|Kevin Hudson|Forbes KB|Pamela Kempthorne|Jose Pecino|David Roker|Frederick Roll|Kit Sinnett|John Snowden|Helen Soraya|Richard Stoker|Harry Taylor|J.P. title: La brújula dorada
